CREATE DATABASE attention_data;
USE attention_data;

CREATE TABLE attention_data (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    studentid INT NOT NULL,
    classid INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL,
    attention_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    average_attention_score FLOAT NOT NULL
);

INSERT INTO attention_data (studentid, classid, timestamp, attention_score, average_attention_score)
